name: Come on!! We'll fight you!!
text: Activate: Main You may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal and add one card with the type [Red Hair Pirates] that is not "Come on!! We'll fight you!!" to your hand. Then place the rest at the bottom of the deck in the order. Trigger Draw one card.

effect.text: You may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal and add one card with the type [Red Hair Pirates] that is not "Come on!! We'll fight you!!" to your hand. Then place the rest at the bottom of the deck in the order.
